Background and Analysis:
	 
Terri Montgomery, Partner with Vavrinek, Trine, Day & Co., LLP (VTD), will provide an update on the audit process for the fiscal year 2013-14 audit.  Terri will discuss the audit timeline and her observations and comments on the audit to date.
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Kevin McElroy, Vice Chancellor, Business Services, x6201
Additional contact names:
 Hector Quinonez, Executive Director, Fiscal Services
Is backup provided?
 No

Background and Analysis:
	 
	 
In accordance with Title 5 Section 58301, the governing board is required to hold a public hearing on the adoption of the 2014-15 proposed budget of the District for the year ending June 30, 2015.  The Board will be asked to officially adopt the budget at its meeting on September 8, 2014.
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Kevin McElroy, Vice Chancellor of Business Services, x6201
Additional contact names:
 Hector Quinonez, Executive Director, Fiscal Services, x6250
 Joni Hayes, Director, Budget Operations, x6261
Is backup provided?
 Yes

Background and Analysis:
	 
The proposed 2015 yearly schedule for the Audit and Finance Committee meetings are as follows:
	 
March 5, 2015 at 3:00 p.m. in the Foothill Conference Room 5971
May 28, 2015 at 3:00 p.m. in the Foothill Conference Room 5971
September 10, 2015 at 3:00 p.m. in the Foothill Conference Room 5971
December 3, 2015 at 3:00 p.m. in the Foothill Conference Room 5971
	 
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Kevin McElroy, Vice Chancellor, Business Services, x6201
Additional contact names:
					 
Is backup provided?
 No
